description: In the evolving blockchain landscape, addressing scalability is crucial. This article delves into layer-2 solutions like Arbitrum and sidechains, exploring their roles in enhancing Ethereum's performance and reducing congestion.
keywords: Blockchain, Scalability, Layer-2 Solutions, Arbitrum, Sidechains, Ethereum, dApps, Blockchain Performance, Blockchain Trilemma, Optimistic Rollups, Ethereum Virtual Machines, Blockchain Security
title: Exploring Layer-2 Solutions: Arbitrum and Sidechains in Blockchain Scalability
